page.title: 10RECREATION IN CRUDEN BAY.
page.content: Port Erroll football club is a new club in Cruden Bay consisting of boys from Cruden Bay and the neighbouring village of Hatton. There are two age groups, under 14 and under 16. Colin Nicoll originally thought of the team and got together a meeting of men who were interested in junior football. A committee was formed and the Chairman is R. Birnie, treasurer, I. Robertson, and Manager F. Platt. The under 16s have not won a game yet so are bottom of their League. THeir games are on Mondays and Wednesdays. The under 14s are doing slightly better. They beat Dales park by 3 goals to 1. Golf, badminton, bowls,(indoor and outdoor) are also played in Cruden Bay.
